thread.title: Motorcyclist dies in accident

author: tribuneindia.com
title: Motorcyclist dies in accident
text:
Chandigarh, October 12
A 25-year-old motorcyclist was killed while the pillion rider was injured after the motorcycle rammed into a Mahindra jeep, which was parked in Burail yesterday. Kamaljit Suri, a resident of Burail village, alleged that the motorcycle rider, Parminder, a resident of Burail, and Rohit (21), a resident of Sector 45, who was riding pillion, were injured after their vehicle rammed into his jeep. They were rushed to the GMCH-32, where Parminder was declared brought dead. â€”TNS
